languages.text: The wearer's successful single attacks inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者使用单体攻击成功击中目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−5{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 装备者使用单体攻击成功击中目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−5{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: -5の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}でターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、使用者の単発攻撃が成功すると、ターゲットを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}にさせる。
languages.original_text: The wearer's successful single attacks inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に失格し、5の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた場合、着用者の成功した単攻撃はターゲットを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}させる。
